page.title: 14Communication
page.content:
Television ___________ At the top of Lanner Hill is the television transmission mast. There are a lot of machines in the station. There is a cooling machine which keeps the electronic machines cool.It works like this. The water goes around the machines and gets hot. The steam goes along the pipes and turns back to water.Then it goes back down the pipes and starts again. There are large fuses for the old machines and the new machines have small fuses.The heat inside comes from the machines.
Telephones ___________ The area is served by a telephone exchange in Redruth.This is an old exchange and will soon be replaced.
